articles.author: Francesca Ebel, Robyn Dixon, Ellen Francis, Catherine Belton, Siobhán O'Grady
articles.title: Russia sees victory as Trump adopts Putin’s approach to ending Ukraine war - The Washington Post
articles.description: In President Donald Trump’s warm red-carpet greeting at the Alaska summit, Russians saw an opening to pull America away from its traditional allies in Europe.
articles.content: MOSCOW For Russia, the results of the Alaska summit between President Donald Trump and Russian President Vladimir Putin marked a turning point in relations with the United States, underlined by Trump… [+66 chars]
